thread.title: Claudia Bell

author: Claudia Bell
title: Claudia Bell
text:
I loved my experience with TransferWise so much that I told 3 different coworkers at my financial institution how fast, easy, and inexpensive it was compared to doing an international wire, or using another money transfer service.
I signed up on Wednesday. They made 2 small deposits into my account in order to verify it on Thursday. Then I got a notice the same day that my transfer from my account in the USA was made in Euros to my payee's account in France.
